name: YouTeam
headline: We make it easy for startups to hire engineers.
description:
YouTeam has helped more than 60 YC startups hire top-notch engineers they couldn't find elsewhere.

YouTeam connects you with select offshore developers seeking full-time contracts that aren't listed on any freelance portals or job boards. We are the only platform accessing this previously untapped talent pool, allowing us to select the "crème de la crème" of the talent.

founders.name: Yura Riphyak, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
15 years as a founder. Key areas: HR Tech, social media, online marketplaces, product development.
LSE Graduate, Chevening scholar.
YouTeam is my 4th company. Previously founded Hubbub.fm -- "Twitter for voice."
I also play chess and write science fiction.

generated_description:
**YouTeam: Revolutionizing Startup Hiring**

Founded in 2017 and hailing from Y Combinator Batch W18, YouTeam has carved out a niche in the ever-competitive tech hiring landscape by streamlining how startups connect with top-tier engineers. The company's mission is straightforward: "We make it easy for startups to hire engineers."

From its base in Mountain View, California, YouTeam has successfully helped over 60 startups—many of which are part of the coveted Y Combinator family—find exceptional engineers they might not have discovered through traditional job boards or freelancing sites. At the core of YouTeam's offering is its unique ability to tap into an untapped talent pool of offshore developers actively seeking full-time contracts. This allows startups to access the "crème de la crème" of tech talent.

**What Makes YouTeam Different?**

Unlike conventional hiring processes that often involve tedious searches and risky negotiations with multiple agencies, YouTeam empowers startups to access a curated shortlist of vetted engineers within days. The platform connects clients to a vast network of over **50,000 engineers** from **500+ top agencies** across Latin America and Europe—with a specific focus on mid- and senior-level developers who are fluent in English and equipped for remote work.

YouTeam’s platform facilitates a personalized matching process. When a startup shares its requirements, the company leverages both AI and expert human judgment to present the most suitable candidates, often within just **three days**. Clients can interview an average of **1.75 candidates per role**, making hiring both efficient and effective.

**Go Beyond Standard Hiring**

Backed by a commitment to flexibility and transparency, YouTeam not only simplifies hiring but also manages the complexities of contracts and payments for its users. This includes standardized contracts, automatic payroll handling, and a one-month trial guarantee. If a startup is not satisfied within the first month, they can walk away—no questions asked.

YouTeam isn't just a hiring platform; it's a partner to many burgeoning companies looking to scale their engineering teams without the traditional headaches of recruitment. 

**What's Next for YouTeam?**

Currently, YouTeam continues to enhance its capabilities and expand its network within the startup ecosystem, striving to facilitate faster, smarter talent acquisition. With a dedicated team of 34 employees, this growing marketplace is set to make waves in the world of startup hiring, providing avenues for businesses to scale efficiently and effectively.

You can explore more about their offerings at [YouTeam.io](https://youteam.io).
